name: Zwar zombie 2018
description:
Zwar zombie 2018 is addicted frontline zombie killer game. Stupid, brainless and wild zombies attacked on a buildings, city and highway. Those Stupid and brainless zombies wants to smash whole city. In this case all humanity is in great danger and all people are defenseless and scared from these stupid and infected zombies.
Features:
• An array of powerful weapons to unlock
• Nail-biting zombie defense gameplay
• Zombies with distinctive abilities
• Intuitive controls
• Stunning visuals
• Electrifying music and SFX
